title: Change payment success tick mark to green color

requirements.summary: Update the checkmark tick icon color to green in the PaymentSuccess component while preserving the existing circle background color
acceptanceCriteria: The tick mark/checkmark icon displays in green color
The circle background behind the tick remains unchanged from its current color
All other elements on the PaymentSuccess screen remain unchanged (logo, text, layout, purple theme)

file_operations.description: Modify the checkmark tick icon styling to display in green color while preserving all other visual elements including the circle background color, logo, text, layout, and purple theme. Locate the checkmark/tick SVG or icon element and update its color/fill property to green (e.g., text-green-500 or fill-green-500) without modifying any parent container background colors or other styling.
